from pathlib import Path

import pandas as pd
import numpy as np

# Visualization Libraries
import matplotlib.pylab as plt
import seaborn as sns

from itertools import cycle

plt.style.use("fivethirtyeight") # ggplot fivethirtyeight

source.bfc06a34:
train_df = pd.read_csv(
    data_dir / "train.csv",
    #     index_col="id",
#     nrows=10000,
)
test_df = pd.read_csv(data_dir / "test.csv")
sample_submission = pd.read_csv(data_dir / "sample_submission.csv")

print(f"train data: Rows={train_df.shape[0]}, Columns={train_df.shape[1]}")
print(f"test data : Rows={test_df.shape[0]}, Columns={test_df.shape[1]}")
source.e70e25e7:
continuous_features = [f for f in train_df.columns if f not in ['id','obj_ID', 'label']]
continuous_features, len(continuous_features)
source.72fe061c:
fig, ax = plt.subplots(5, 3, figsize=(14, 24))
i=0
for i, feature in enumerate(continuous_features):
    plt.subplot(5, 3, i+1)
    sns.histplot(train_df[feature][::100], 
                 color="blue", 
                 kde=True, 
                 bins=100)
    plt.xlabel(feature, fontsize=9)
plt.show()
